front.title: A Survey of Resource Control in P2P Systems

abstract.t: This document describes the resource control mechanisms utilized byexisting P2P applications. The intent of this document is togenerate discussion in the community about resource control andprovide guidance for DECADE requirements. For example, some of theseresource control functions could be supported DECADE to enable betterusability of in-network storage for a wide range of P2P applications.
